nested.name: _func_MongoDB
nested.label: Function: MongoDB
nested.help: Find, insert and update documents in MongoDB

spec.name: url
spec.label: URL
spec.help:
URL to fetch the `MongoDB` outputs to submit to the Assistant.
The field is **required** in order for the tool to be called. Only `POST` HTTP method is currently supported.
If you specify this URL, the function will be automatically added to the **Tools** parameter.

spec.name: method
spec.label: HTTP Method
spec.help: The HTTP method to use for the tool call. If not specified, defaults to `POST`.

select.label: By appending to the body of document
